website_summaries.verdict: A good variety of fruits and vegetables that babies love.
pros: Good for ages 6 months and up
A good way to get your baby to eat their spinach
cons: The consistency can be a little too runny for stage 2

customer_reviews.title: Love happy baby pouches but don’t order these
customer_reviews.text: They come without an inside box - pouches just haphazardly thrown into larger packaging. As much as I want to reduce packaging waste, I am feeding these to my children and worry there is something wrong with them the way they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Abby507vc

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: Half of the packs were expired when I received them. Four expired a couple weeks ago, and another four expired 2 months ago! The other 8 expire in just over 3 months. I thought ordering baby food would be a huge convenience, but that’s unfortunately not the case.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas steketee

customer_reviews.title: Molded Pouches
customer_reviews.text: WE love happy baby brand but this was completely unacceptable. The pouches looked like they were just tossed in the box without care - which was a bit unusual at first. As I unloaded the packages I noticed a few had exploded and were filled with mold. The bottom of the box was covered in mold. I highly recommend Happy baby brand, I just DO NOT recommend this seller.
customer_reviews.author: carolinedunivant

customer_reviews.title: More than 10% Cane Sugar
customer_reviews.text: I took for granted that the Earth's Best Toddler formula was good, since the Infant formula has good and wholesome ingredients, and we've been giving that as supplement to our infant. Now she's over 1 year and we wanted to continue some of the supplementation. I didn't read the ingredient list this time and realized when I opened it that it has over 10% added cane sugar in it! Completely unnecessary and not something I will give my one year old, she should not have any processed sugar so young and definitely not at bedtime. Very disappointed with Earth's Best (not best at all).
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: Expires less than 15 days after receiving - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: So annoyed. I just went through my cabinet to organize the various pouches I have bought and I notice the dates on this package - - Bought Dec 27th and expires Jan 12th. Wth??? When I buy these in the store they usually have expiration date of almost a year. Now some of the flavors have a later date of February but honestly I don't tend to buy any food for my child that is close to expiration in case of mishandling.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: yummy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a snack for myself when I'm away from home, and absolutely love the flavors and smoothness. The pouches are really good for compacting, and squeezing out the entire contents (except for the tiny amount that is left in the nozzle). The amount in each pouch seems adequate to hold my hunger at bay until lunch or dinner, and very satisfying both in flavor and texture. Definitely buying again. Also, there is no added sugars of any sort, except for the naturally occurring sugars from the fruit or veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ackley

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t receive all flavors advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t come with all four flavors as advertised. When I order I product I expect it to come with everything as described.
customer_reviews.author: William  Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Flavors may not be as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Update: My baby changed her mind and ended up liking all of these after the first pouch. I should also note that all pouches expired more than 10 months out. I should have noticed that it says the flavors very. Don’t expect to get the ones pictured. We got flavors that my daughter is not as into. The least desirable being the 4 pouches of apples, spinach, & kale. Definitely wasn’t a hit in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: The baby food could be good but I’m not giving it to my son.
customer_reviews.text: I just don’t know what to do? It doesn’t look like any of this was handled with care and there is a hole punctured through one. Not sure if I can give this to my child because I’m unfaithful that they used any care or even paid attention to what they were shipping. It defeated the purpose of me buying healthy good food for my child. I’m buying all food from the store from here on, really Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Jamierose Rawlings

customer_reviews.title: Citrullinemia Type I
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has Citrullinemia Type I and he's is only the second person in the world with this specific type. Well he has a diet that has to be maintained very carefully. He is only allowed fruits and vegetables, we have to stay away from protein. Thanks to this our grandson really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta (Yodichkas) Michael

customer_reviews.title: great flavor selection
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good combination for variety of foods but just different enough from each other. When my daughter was transitioning to toddler food, she would still like these packets on the go for out and about adventures or in a pinch between meals. When she decided she was done with the squeeze packets I used the remaining ones in pancake mixes so they were not wasted and I knew there was hidden nutrition in the carby goodness she recently discovered. I have nothing negative to say about this brand, or this product.... I may have eaten a few in a pinch as well, that mom-life-food-balance struggle is real...
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bigoss

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these
customer_reviews.text: Of all the variety of pouched food, my kids love the Bananas, Beets & Blueberries the most. Currently they are aged 1-5 and will all suck these down whenever given the opportunity. My one year old will dig through the pouch bin until she finds those purple tops. Don't know what magic they put in these. Maybe the Bananas, Beets & Blueberries lean more heavy on the fruit and have a bit more natural sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Pal

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old Baby loves flavors
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my one year old. Whether I spoon feed from pouch or she grabs and eats from pouch we enjoy this food for lunches or dinners together. Packaging was compact and secure
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie87

customer_reviews.title: NOT a variety pack!
customer_reviews.text: Received three purple top flavor, and the entire remainder was green. The picture depicts a variety. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: E. Mccutcheon

customer_reviews.title: great flavors packaging not as well
customer_reviews.text: gerber has better packaging, the spout is less of a mouth hazard but it does the job and the flavors are nice **Please help and select if you thought this was helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany JohnsonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good amount for value
customer_reviews.text: They all came loose in a Happy Baby box. The Pears, Peas and Broccoli pouches seemed like they were on the sour side (my little one did not like these). The other flavors went down easy. The ‘beet’ Mixture will stain clothes, so be careful. Good amount for value - would be willing to try them again sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Banana, beet, blueberry is a HIT with young & old
customer_reviews.text: My son, now 3, was a very picky baby and didn't take a shine to flavors like broccoli and peas. He preferred the sweeter veggies. So the Banana, Beet, and Blueberry puree was the safest choice for him (and hey, all 3 ingredients are more nutrient-dense than your standard apple/pear/grape puree). I admit it... two years later, we are STILL ordering this flavor in the 16-pack because my 3-year-old, my 7-year-old, and I all LOVE them as a snack or dessert! Great squeezed over plain yogurt or peanut butter. (My daughter does insist that the word "BABY" be crossed out with a Sharpie before she'll take these to school :))
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Sniderman

customer_reviews.title: Expired or expiring soon
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of baby food but unfortunately most of the pack was unusable. Of the 16 pouches 4 had already expired and 8 were set to expire within the week.
customer_reviews.author: ESB

customer_reviews.title: Unlikely reviewer
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with this product that I felt compelled to write about it. My 14 month old picky eater would not eat ANYTHING but toddler formula and english muffins. I started cooking for him since he was 5 months old and he ate well but something happened when I went back to work and he no longer accepts "good" food. However, he happily ate entire pack of HappyBaby Spinach, Mango & Pear and asked for more two days in the row! My husband is a Mr. Mom for now so weight off his shoulders as far as feeding. We ordered other flavors and hoping trend with eating organic veggies and fruits will continue with our picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: white_lilac

customer_reviews.title: while my little one does not like it. The label shows it will expire in ...
customer_reviews.text: The quantity worth the money, while my little one does not like it. The label shows it will expire in one year. I don't know if there is too much preservative My husband decided to finished them, he tasted them and said they are too sweet than natural food.
customer_reviews.author: Saamiyoq

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.tasty and nutrion all in one!
customer_reviews.text: so, i have tried this ine the beets with bannans and Peter rabbits squash (orange packet) my son (16months) loves these. he can open the pouch himself walk around and self eat, now with him running all day it is hard for him to sit and be still with this at least he can run around and still have something in his tummy. I highly recommend this product and company. no gmos and organic what a mom wants in food that she didnt make. it is thin but makes it easy to eat out of pouch with little to no sucking involved. i even like them, but i try all food before i give it to my son, quite tasty!
customer_reviews.author: adamclarkcyless

customer_reviews.title: My
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these. Other brands can sometimes be a hit or miss with flavors but my little guy has loved this entire variety pack. They’re good at this stage for him as a snack, supplement to a nursing session or in addition to some finger foods at meal time.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Variety not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The 4 varieties are just thrown into a box. I did not receive the apricot, sweet potato and banana flavor as shown on the picture. Instead, I received 4 pouches of the apple, spinach and kale flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged pouch
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and one pouch was punctured. Very disappointed and feeling uneasy to use the rest given sanitary reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: packaging could not be better, no complant. Flavor is just so so.
customer_reviews.author: BETTER  and STONGER

customer_reviews.title: Baby is happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Baby loved them all, seems high priced though I ordered again lol
customer_reviews.author: danielle Conner

customer_reviews.title: Yummy food for your little one
customer_reviews.text: I have a recurring prime order for these because my son loves them. He used them when he was a baby and now that he's a toddler we use them on the go or in lunch boxes. A trick I learned from his daycare - save and clean the lids. You'll amass a bunch of them quickly and they are great toys to stack, sort, and play with. right now my son's favorite toy is a shoebox we decorated and cut holes in to sort lids.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best flavor
customer_reviews.text: Not the best flavors... I use this only for when I travel and the apricot is too sour Baby makes faces every time she eats this flavor
customer_reviews.author: paunovelo

customer_reviews.title: Not the right flavors.
customer_reviews.text: I got 16 “spinach mango pear super chia” pouches instead of the 4 different flavors. My son doesn’t hate the flavor, but pretty disappointed that we have that many of one flavor!
customer_reviews.author: SJackson

customer_reviews.title: Please Don't Stop Making 'Two Birds'!
customer_reviews.text: Please don't stop making this product or change the packaging. My son calls this 'Two Birds' and it is one of his all-time favorite foods! (His other favorite flavor is 'One Bird', the Mango pouch.) I like the pictures on the packaging as well. It makes it easier for young ones to ask for what they would like to have.
customer_reviews.author: HRH-FishAreFish

customer_reviews.title: Great for on-the-go snacks
customer_reviews.text: My one year old can actually "drink" these right from the package, using the spout like a straw, which makes these a super convenient option to have for snacks when we're out and about--no bib or spoon needed. He has food allergies, so finding processed foods that meet his needs and are still healthy and conveninent can be tough. He has loved all of the Happy Baby products we've tried. The multi-packs are a great deal and it is nice to be able to stock up this way instead of just buying singles from the only store around here that carries them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcilla P

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves them, I love them. Very tastey and smell amazing. Far better than other brands. My baby throws up Gerber every time. Other brands upset his little tummy. Little pricey but worth it to keep baby happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Rudzik

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, transportable snacks the kids love
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. I like transportable, mostly non-messy snacks to keep around the cars and my purse that I can whip out when they turn into hunger monsters.
customer_reviews.author: Edward McWhirter

customer_reviews.title: Great snack while travelling
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - GREAT TASTE. My toddler has been eating/ drinking these since he was 9 months old. He is now 4 yrs old and asks for it as his treat. He loves the flavors. He considers these his "desserts." His little sister loves them too! - GREAT FOR TRAVEL. The pouch style (vs can) allows me to give him a pouch without using a spoon or bib. The spoon sold w/ these type of baby food are not necessary. They travel well in your purse/ baby bag. CONS: none
customer_reviews.author: W Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a necessity having a baby in the house. I like to buy in bulk so I don't have to order all the time. They came on-time and were good quality and had a nice variety of flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Travel_girl

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old started eating this flavor at about 7 months old and loves it! She isn't really a picky eater, but she likes some things more than others. When its time for the spinach/mango/pear she takes one tastes then asks for more! I've tasted it, its pretty good. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because the consistency is a bit watery and difficult to keep on the spoon when feeding the baby. I'd love it if they just didn't puree it quite as much or didn't add quite so much water, then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Girl Mom

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE! All came expired!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ALL POUCHES WERE EXPIRED !! I noticed after I gave one to my daughter she was so crabby her tummy hurt all night. Inlater checked and all the pouches had expired 3 months ago!!!! So mad 😡 never buying again.
customer_reviews.author: dickens75

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Expired in 2016! Wrong Product and Not in Original Packaging!!
customer_reviews.text: I received a box full of individual pouches rather than in the original box as advertised, and it was the wrong "flavor" of fruit/veggies than what I ordered. ** I went back to add to my original review that I checked the expiration date (THANK YOU to previous reviewers) and these expired in 2016! Unbelievable to try to give to babies and children :(
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Daughter's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's favorite Stage 2 food! This smells great and actually tastes good (I tried it). I usually mix her Stage 2 foods with baby cereal or yogurt. I switch this out with the Stage 2 Spinach, Mango, Pear pouches. Update: Not long after I wrote this, my daughter figured out how to eat the food directly out of the pouch. Now, at 2 1/2, she still likes to snack on these. I like that they're easy to throw in my purse for a healthy snack on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Everyday Sensory Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for good product, I just ordered and donated for my friend who just lost her husband, and her baby loves it. This make me feel so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great organic pouches!
customer_reviews.text: These pouches have great ingredients and my son absolutely loves them! They’re so convenient for on the go snacks. We order them regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby likes it. Ingredients seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies
customer_reviews.text: These were great for our 8mo. He loved the flavors and we loved the price. Will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jinju

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I tried all of these and they taste pretty good except for the one with peas, I only taste the pea flavor, and cold mashed peas are gross! all the others taste like fruit :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product 👍
customer_reviews.text: My baby gobbles these up. Easy to keep in diaper bag for a meal
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: My nephew really enjoyed the flavors and wanted more
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves each of these flavors. He is six months old and enjoys these items. We poured them into a bowl and used a spoon as he was too young to eat from the tubes. My nephew really enjoyed the flavors and wanted more.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda M. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, healthy, organic and mess free!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing these fruit and vegetable combo packets for a few months now through subscribe and save and I love them. My baby loves all of the flavor combos and I love them because they are organic, convenient to use, and mess free. They are super convenient to carry around in the diaper bag too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES these!!! She begs for them the moment we get into the car when I pick her up from preschool. The only hard this is that she can't open the cap by herself (which I don't mind, or else, she's "break into them"). The cap is also resealable, which is nice in case. I highly recommend these. I used to buy Ella's Kitchen Organic Smoothies and baby food pouches, but they are WAY more expensive! The taste is just as great! Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy L.

customer_reviews.title: Most convenient way to feed a baby ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little food packs. I squeeze the puree directly onto a spoon and feed my baby, and that way no dishes get dirty other than the spoon. He loves these purees, he'll eat any flavor and they seem quite natural and healthy. As he gets older he can even suck directly out of the pouch, though sometimes he squeezes too hard and makes a little mess if I let him hold it himself. They are also super portable and conveniently stored.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Lark

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it
customer_reviews.text: Baby likes it. Expiration on my batch was about 10 months away which is pretty good. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: M R

customer_reviews.title: Pouches not sealed correctly
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pouches for my son. I went to give him one right after they were delivered and there was dry / moldy food in the lid so I threw it away and grabbed another one and it was the same way. I have never had this issue with any other pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep my toddler eating his veggies!
customer_reviews.text: My son has a very high gag reflex and transitioning to solids has been a task. However, he also won't have anything to do with homemade baby food anymore. We found these pouches when buying food for a trip and he was hooked. I like that the veggies are organic, the pouches produce little garbage, that he can feed himself, but most importantly, that it is keeping the taste of veggies in his diet while we slowly work on chewing veggies.
customer_reviews.author: A. Yung

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, but this one has too much sugar in one bag. It's good for traveling with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: She isn't very interested in using utensils on her own so she is happy as can be carrying this pouch around
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old is very picky about what she eats but she loves these pouches. She isn't very interested in using utensils on her own so she is happy as can be carrying this pouch around. And, im happy because it is a healthy and organic option that I am extremely happy with!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just a little pricey compared to other baby food
customer_reviews.text: If you want/need convenience, this item is fabulous! We always rate the organic baby food pouches high and our only concern is the price. We find the pouches great for taking to restaurants, in the car, on picnics, to the zoo, etc. Also, it continues to be an easy way to get super foods into our toddlers without the preparation of the fruits and vegetables! We still keep them on hand even after the baby food days are gone.
customer_reviews.author: frugaljohanna

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Get Their Veggies This Way
customer_reviews.text: I have a love-hate relationship with these things, and I've tried all the reusable pouches too, but the Happy Baby pouches are top quality, and I keep coming back to them. My kids prefer the Broccoli, Peas and Pear pouches over cookies for snacks. As much as I hate to spend the money, it's easy to justify it with the nutrition. Add it as a Subscribe and Save item, and it's quite reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: C.V.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: These are my grandsons favorite! We have tried many different brands but he likes these the best.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Novak

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old loves these pouches and it's a great way of getting broccoli into her diet. she just started being able to do it herself recently, although it's sometimes messy. I just wish they were available in the larger size. 3.5 ounces is not a lot for a toddler - she can finish this in a minute and would want more. She also loves the spinach, mango, and pear happy baby pouches which are bigger.
customer_reviews.author: HLKNYC

customer_reviews.title: Good zapper!
customer_reviews.text: I used it indoors- overall it worked relatively well. I thought it would work faster. It wasn't a miracle product, but it did end up zapping many bugs over the course of several days so it was effective overall. solid product and good build at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was a preemie, so she started solids later then most. She is a very independent baby and when I tried to feed her out of a jar with a spoon, she was not liking the transition to solids. When we started using this Happy Baby brand she was able to feed herself (with supervision) in no time and really started to enjoy eating solids. I also love that these are pure, organic ingredients for her little body and that the veggies are mixed with pear so she is getting the best of both worlds!
customer_reviews.author: teeniemarie

customer_reviews.title: Babys fav
customer_reviews.text: My 8mo loves this flavor. It's our go to when she's having a fussy day & refusing to eat other adventurous flavors. I can always count on her eating this whole pouch. One thing to be aware of is that this is the most liquidy baby food ever. It's great because she will just suck it right out of the pouch, but if your going to spoon feed it you need to add a lot of cereal.
customer_reviews.author: ActionJem

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these and they are perfect for the car when ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and they are perfect for the car when we are running late and I need a quick snack for my kids, they are healthier than junk food and I know they are getting a few veggies. I have always used these for my babies and now my older boys as they love them, the taste and the ease of taking them with me!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kaylorboys

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors ...
customer_reviews.text: Used to change/improve flavor of Boost! It works and is well consumed!
customer_reviews.author: D. Mathurin

customer_reviews.title: I buy this for my niece to pack for her ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my niece to pack for her lunches...and she loves it! It is one of her favorites...she asks for it and will choose it over some other flavors...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Noland

customer_reviews.title: Good texture and taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the baby, but the toddler loves them the most. They are a great way to get your kids to get a serving of fruits and veggies in when they get to the stage where they won't eat everything on their plate. Will he eat steamed veggies? Not always, but he will eat one of these organic pouches in a heartbeat every time. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, healthy ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I love all of the HappyBaby pouches because of their fresh taste and healthy ingredients. My toddlers love feeding themselves with these. I also mix it in their yogurt and even make smoothies for myself. This is one of my favorite flavors to use because of the health benefits of blueberries and beets (plus my little ones love the taste!) HappyBaby makes it so easy to introduce my kids to a wide variety of fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, expired product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!!! Pouches were visibly worn and EXPIRED as far back as 2018!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived expired by over 1 year!!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived expired by over a year!!! What if I hadn't looked at the expiration date? Completely unacceptable. Don't recommend this seller at all (like happy baby product otherwise)
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these on subscribe and save on a monthly bases. My son loves these and has the ability to pick the flavor he wants. Great price and great snack option!
customer_reviews.author: iliketoshop.always.

customer_reviews.title: Pouches are loose in the box, wet and have an odor
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had more thoroughly read the reviews prior to purchasing. Like many have written, these arrive loosely in the shopping box, not in their original packaging. Upon opening, multiple picked felt wet and had an odor. I inspected each pouch but did not find evidence of a leak. I'm not sure what is wet, but I don't feel comfortable feeding these picked to my infant based on the condition they arrived in. Definitely returning.
customer_reviews.author: spenam

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: One of the best bulk deals around for healthy baby food.
customer_reviews.author: The_Pines

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! They smell good and he chooses these over many other brands he’s been offered. A great way to start introducing new flavors while knowing you are choosing healthy choices for your child
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ... were placed in a regular shipping box and were dirty like one pouch opened and got all of over ...
customer_reviews.text: The pouches were placed in a regular shipping box and were dirty like one pouch opened and got all of over the rest of the pouches.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this food. It is great quality and her favorite. I would definitely recommend this to any parents looking for quality organic baby food. We done a lot of research and even made our own food for a while. I am comfortable feeding this to my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Desire M.

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely his favorite and it's really the only way he'll eat anything ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. This is definitely his favorite and it's really the only way he'll eat anything remotely healthy, so I'm all about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathlyn Feazel

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this combo well enough but not enough for me to order again. I'm not sure why baby food pouches taste so different from one company to the next but my son definitely prefers a different brand. These ended up being a good price with subscribe and save, though! Much less expensive than purchasing in the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not so pleasant taste & smell
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fruit & veggie combos but my daughter doesn’t really enjoy them like she does other brands so I end up mixing them with other foods just to use them up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to supplement with more vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Good for intermediate when they still can’t have solid food. Downside: lots fruit and not enough vegetables and not varied enough
customer_reviews.author: Knowledge Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the go
customer_reviews.text: I’m an adult and I eat these on the go so my blood sugar doesn’t drop
customer_reviews.author: B. Dingess

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves them! Super easy to use and yummy. Never any mold or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these! They have simple ingredients and good flavors
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these! They have simple ingredients and good flavors. My kids (ages 5,3,1) love them so much I can use them as bribery (guilt free on my part). I have a monthly subscription. This is the best price I have found.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Robertson

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old veggies
customer_reviews.text: Pouches are how I get my ridiculously picky 4 year old to eat veggies when I don’t have time to hide them in smoothies. He loves the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for on the go.
customer_reviews.text: My kids are obsessed. The price here was a lot better than at the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: DLS

customer_reviews.title: Watery consistency
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually write reviews, however this time I’ve decided to write one. The product is not bad, there is variety of fruits and veggies in one pouch. I don’t like the consistency of it thoug... it’s somehow watery. Besides, it tastes so sour, I believe due to the ascorbic acid in it. I’ve tried different brands, and will be moving on to a different company for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: so i taste everything i put in the baby's mouth... and this tastes great. mango stands out. if you're trying to introduce a veggie, like spinach, and baby shows an aversion- this could be another way to go. mine loves mango, but is not too into spinach when i make it for him. so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go
customer_reviews.text: This type of packaging is perfect for feeding baby on the go. We've tried squirting it onto a spoon from the packaging (to keep it from becoming contaminated) and squirting it straight into baby's mouth (we forgot a spoon that time). Both worked just fine. The pears are the dominant flavor in this mixture which worked out very well because our baby doesn't like broccoli, but he liked this!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle B

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the lemon juice
customer_reviews.text: My baby did like this, the problem is the lemon juice, ask your Dr. Mine requested I wait, I had no idea before ordering boxes and boxes of this brand that they put lemon juice in some of their pouched foods. Mine had a horrible reaction to it. Try it out at target before you go nuts like I did
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Happy Baby food is super delicious and nutritious!
customer_reviews.text: I know I can make the same thing at home in my blender. However, my kids won't eat it because it's not in a cool squeeze container like the Happy Baby blends. They are the best! Both my children love them and I am happy to let them grab them off the shelf at anytime. The nutritional value is hard to beat. The quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: HS Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Use subscribe and save with these!
customer_reviews.text: These are all great! Love these with monthly subscribe and save. Try to get more than 5 things each month to get a bigger discount!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Makes him go
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two year old son who is actually a great eater, but from time to time becomes a little constipated. These often help him go, due to the pears and the consistency. It doesn't give him a belly ache like straight-up juice. I gave it 4 stars because they are small.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: One of my toddler's favorites
customer_reviews.text: This is another one of my daughter's favorite snacks. She seems to prefer the varieties with pears in them, and I do like that is is getting some spinach and that she actually likes it! She does prefer the Peas, Broccoli, & Pear flavor, but this is also a favorite. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the smell of the mango can be pretty overpowering. I like fresh mango, but for some reason the smell of mango baby food is just awful to me! Other than that, a good product that I'll be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Livings

customer_reviews.title: Veggie Flavor
customer_reviews.text: They just taste too much like veggies for my kid who hates vegetables. We buy squeezes to sneak veggies into my kid's diet. These don't have a very good flavor profile for that and we did not like them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnea Rose

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I take advantage of these great prices on baby food from Amazon with my first ...
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I take advantage of these great prices on baby food from Amazon with my first kid? This was so much easier using Amazon and cheaper. Love this company and the kids loved these pouches. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Flynn

customer_reviews.title: sure is a lot of plastic for such a small product would like them to get more earth friendly with packaging
customer_reviews.text: Just wish they would change out the lid for these pouches, sure is a lot of plastic for such a small product would like them to get more earth friendly with packaging. But the flavor is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tenacious Audacity

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 9-month old daughter LOVES these flavors! And I don't have to feel guilty because they're pure, simple ingredients with no added fillers or chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: kellygt

customer_reviews.title: Our Favorite Happy Baby Flavor
customer_reviews.text: We have tried almost all of the Happy Baby flavors and I can honestly say that this one is my daughter's favorite flavor of this brand. I only wish that the package was slightly larger as she is able to finish it in a few moments and sometimes wants a second!
customer_reviews.author: birdstorebird

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy meal on the go. Baby loves all the flavors
customer_reviews.author: Angavelar

customer_reviews.title: Flavors are too tart
customer_reviews.text: My 6 month old did not care for this. The flavors are too tart
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it, its a little liquidy though
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product. My daughter eats it right up and seems to enjoy it. I will say however that it is very liquidy (no texture) so I have more drips when feeding her. I wish it were a bit more solid in texture (I really like Plum Baby Food due to the texture). Again, daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jenncowa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome baby food-great price!
customer_reviews.text: The pouches available on subscribe and save are awesome and at such good prices-I use only these and homemade baby food for my baby and it's actually cheaper than jars and I get organic! This baby food is awesome-baby loves every flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Happy Baby Organic Stage 2 Baby Food Simple Combos Variety Pack, 4 Ounce Pouch (Pack of 16), Assorted Flavors, Flavors May Vary
product_meta.description: At happy family, we aim to provide your little ones with the nutrition they need to grow and shine. Our happy baby simple combos are delicious combinations of organic fruits and veggies created for babies who have graduated from starting solids.
feature_bullets: SIMPLE COMBOS: At 6+ months, babies are ready for our Simple Combos—a puree of two or three fruits and vegetables blended for delicious, mom-approved flavor. These delicious, organic baby food pouches let baby explore new, exciting flavor combinations.

STAGE TWO EATERS: Great for the exploratory taste buds of Stage 2 eaters, our Stage 2 baby foods and baby snacks introduce baby to simple balances of organic fruits and veggies in a smooth puree with all the new flavors your baby is learning to love.

HAPPY BABY: At Happy Baby Organics, we provide organic and delicious options for your baby's nutritional journey. We develop premium organic recipes perfectly matched with your child's age and stage. This is enlightened nutrition for every family.

MINDFULLY MADE: We develop premium organic recipes perfectly matched with your child's age and stage. Explore our snacks & meals for growing babies, toddlers & kids, from baby food pouches to freeze-dried yogurt treats, organic cereals & toddler snacks. No gluten

HAPPY TUMMIES: We’re changing the way we feed our children with organic meals & snacks everyone can enjoy! Try our full line of baby food pouches, probiotic cereals, whole milk yogurt, teething wafers & baby snacks.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
